Test posts#new controller

Update file spec/controllers/posts_controller_spec.rb

Add 

   describe "GET 'new'" do
     it "returns http success" do
       get 'new'
       response.should be_success
     end
   end

Becomes 

 
 describe PostsController do
 
   describe "GET 'new'" do
     it "returns http success" do
       get 'new'
       response.should be_success
     end
   end
 
 end
